title: SYNTHIA P0 Complete - Master Context & Execution Plan

title: Epic: King Mode 3D, PopeBot, and VisionClaw
BEAD-KM-001: Git sync + security lockdown
description: Pull origin/main (BEAD-101), gitignore secrets, commit all local untracked work, open PRs for feature branches, handle dependabot PR #7.

title: BEAD-KM-002: Saleor agentic commerce stack
description: Create services/saleor/ with GraphQL tools (product_search, checkout_flow, order_management, storefront_config) and saleor_agent.py. Set as default ecommerce template. Wire 4 knights as operators. Add database entry. Ref: https://docs.saleor.io

title: BEAD-KM-003: 4 Knights - Marcus Lemonis People/Process/Product/Gratitude
description: Assign knights to Lemonis departments: Blitz=People, Patch=Process, Dash=Product, Stitch=Gratitude/BENEVOLENCIA. Update agent configs + KingModeChessboard.tsx with visual pillar identities. Ref: marcuslemonis.com 3P framework.

title: BEAD-KM-004: BENEVOLENCIA social purpose company entity
description: Create ecosystem/benevolencia/ (README, BRAND.md, PROGRAMS.md, AGENT_CONFIG.md). Register BENEVOLENCIA(TM) in trademark registry. Assign Stitch Knight as operator. Social Purpose Company owned by THE PAULI EFFECT. Gratitude department.

title: BEAD-KM-005: Franken-Claw(TM) trademark + brand
description: Create services/franken-claw/ (README, BRAND.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, CHANGELOG.md). Register Franken-Claw(TM) in trademark registry. Document as ArchonX fork of OpenClaw + IronClaw security derivative. Brand: our proprietary value-add gateway.

title: BEAD-KM-006: Heart and Soul files - all 64 agents
description: Create .agent-souls/white/ and .agent-souls/black/ directories. Write [agent].soul.md for all 32 chess pieces per crew (64 total). Each file: Identity, Purpose, Core Values, Capabilities, Iron Claw Security Constraints, King Mode Alignment, Gratitude Statement.

title: BEAD-KM-007: Context7 MCP - wire into all agents
description: Add context7 to mcp_settings.json (npx -y @upstash/context7-mcp). Inject context7 compliance directive into all agent system prompts. Add to AGENTS.md as mandatory rule. Add to agent-lightning bootstrap checklist. GitHub: github.com/upstash/context7

title: BEAD-KM-008: Blender MCP + Remotion skills
description: Install blender-mcp (pip/uvx). Add to mcp_settings.json. Create services/blender/. Create archonx/tools/remotion_render.py subprocess tool. Create archonx/skills/remotion_renderer.py. Scaffold visualization/remotion/ project. Blender: github.com/ahujasid/blender-mcp

title: BEAD-KM-009: Pauli Pope Bot activation + pawn training
description: Update SOUL.md with pawn training authority. Update archonx/core/agents.py to link all 32 pawns to PopeBot supervisor. Create paulis-pope-bot/training/ curriculum (6 modules). Update KingModeChessboard.tsx with PopeBot training beams + progress bar. Update orchestrator pawn routing through PopeBot.

title: BEAD-KM-010: Database entries for all new entities
description: Add records for: BENEVOLENCIA, Franken-Claw, 4 Knights x Lemonis departments, Saleor default stack, 64 soul file registry, Context7 MCP dependency, Blender MCP tool, Remotion skill, PopeBot pawn assignments. Update agentRegistry.ts.

title: BEAD-KM-013: King Mode Gemini 3.1 handoff - final PRD delivery

KingModeChessboard.tsx + soul files + BENEVOLENCIA + Franken-Claw + Saleor + Context7 + Blender + PopeBot. Hand off with strict build prompt.
